label: Remeikis, Andrius & Jonas R. Stonis.  2015. First discovery of Quercus-feeding Nepticulidae (Lepidoptera) in South America, with description of new species and designation of the S. nigriverticella complex in the S. saginella group. Zootaxa 4057(3): 409–429.
